modal.shutdowntext: Are you sure you want to shutdown The Box?
modal.restarttext: Are you sure you want to restart The Box?
modal.shutdownconfirmation: The Box is going to shutdown now.
modal.restartconfirmation: The Box is restarting. Please wait a moment.

errors.statuses: There has been an error retriving applcation statuses.

feedback.not_empty: Your username must be at least 3 characters long.
Your password must be at least 7 characters long.

content.description: Welcome to The Box. This is were you will be able to manage all The Box parameters.

accesspoint.title: Access Point
accesspoint.description: Create a wifi access point. You can use this to create a wifi relay or to directly connect to The Box.

mpd.title: MPD
mpd.description:
Listen to your music on The Box. You can find informations on MPD here.

You'll need an MPD client to control the music. There are many available MPD clients for Android, IOS or for your computer. For Android I recommend MPDroid, it's free.

mpdgui.title: MPD GUI
mpdgui.linkhelp: Control your music from your browser.

filesharing.title: Sharing
filesharing.description: Share your USB disks over your local network.

password.help: Update your network shares password. The user to connect to your shares is 'thebox'.

credentials.help: Update your username and password to manage your torrents.

upnpdlna.title: UPNP / DLNA
upnpdlna.description:
Play your media on your external devices. You can find informations about UPNP here and DLNA here.

You can access your media with VLC or there is plenty of software that can access UPNP/DLNA server.
upnpdlna.rescanhelp: Rescan your medias if you added some USB devices and you cannot find their medias in your library.
upnpdlna.rebuildhelp: If you cannot find your library or experience trouble connecting the service, rebuild your medias database can help. It could take a long time if you have a lot of disks connected.

cloudstorage.title: Cloud storage
cloudstorage.description: Sync and share files across your devices. The Box use Seafile as the cloud storage server.

storage.help: Change your storage location to another disk or directory. It could take a long time if you have a lot of files and you change the location to another disk. Check recovery mode to recover from an old storage location.
storage.emptydir: Folder is empty, you can select it to store your cloud data.
storage.storagerecovery: You can select it to store your cloud data.

username.title: Username
username.description: Enter your new username or old one if you don't want to change it.

feedback.not_empty: Your username must be at least 4 characters long.

password.title: Password
password.description: Enter your new password or old one if you don't want to change it.

feedback.not_empty: Your password must be at least 7 characters long.
